servinfo.title: Camshaft, Tappet and Shim Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Camshaft, Tappet and Shim Components:For M16A Engine with VVT

item.ptxt: Keep working table, tools and hands clean while overhauling.
Use special care to handle aluminum parts so as not to damage them.
Do not expose removed parts to dust. Keep them always clean.

s1.ptxt: Remove timing chain cover referring to Timing Chain Cover Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Remove timing chain referring to Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
With hexagonal section (1) of intake camshaft (2) held stationary with spanner or the like, loosen mounting bolt of intake cam timing sprocket assembly (3) and remove it.

attention2.ptxt: Never attempt to loosen mounting bolt with intake cam timing sprocket assembly held stationary. Failure to follow this could result in damage to lock pin.
Do not loosen bolt “a” because intake cam timing sprocket assembly is not serviceable.

s1.ptxt: Loosen camshaft housing bolts in such order as indicated in the figure and remove them.
Remove camshaft housings.
Remove intake and exhaust camshafts.
Remove camshaft bearing (1).
Remove tappets (2) with shims (1).

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Camshaft, Tappet and Shim Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT

s1.ptxt: Install tappets and shims to cylinder head.
Apply engine oil around tappet and then install it to cylinder head.

attention3.ptxt: When installing shim, make sure to direct shim No. side toward tappet.

s1.ptxt: Install camshaft bearing (1) to cylinder head.

attention2.ptxt: Do not apply engine oil to camshaft bearing back.
Only a upper half bearing of intake camshaft bearing No.1 has some holes. Other bearings.

s1.ptxt: Install intake camshaft (1) and exhaust camshaft (2).
Align knock pin (3) and match mark (4) with notches (5) as shown in the figure.

attention3.ptxt: Before installing camshafts, turn crankshaft until key position faces upward.
Refer to Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .

s1.ptxt: Apply engine oil to sliding surface of each camshaft and camshaft journal then install them as shown in the figure.
Install camshaft housing pins (1) as shown in the figure.
Check position of camshaft housings.
Embossed marks are provided on each camshaft housing, indicating position and direction for installation. Install housings as indicated by these marks.

entry.ptxt: I: Intake side or E: Exhaust side

s1.ptxt: After applying engine oil to housing bolts, tighten them temporarily first. Then tighten them by the numerical order in the figure. Tighten a little at a time and evenly among bolts and repeat tightening sequence two or three times before they are tightened to specified torque.
With hexagonal section (1) of intake camshaft (2) held stationary with spanner or the like, tighten bolt of intake cam timing sprocket assembly (3) to specification.
Install timing chain with crankshaft sprocket referring to Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Install timing chain cover referring to Timing Chain Cover Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Check valve lashes referring to Valve Lash (Clearance) Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Perform Steps 3) to 8) of “Installation” of Timing Chain Cover Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
